Translations.Text: The Multus Gracious
Ludimagister Quran
Creator human beings
He taught them quam distinguish
sun moon perfectly calculated
stars trees prostrate
He constructed caelum established juris
Vos non transgress juris
Vos establish justice non violate juris
He created terra totus creatures
In it ibi est fruits datum palms their hanging fruit
Alias grains ac spices
(O humans jinns) de tuus Dominus marvels vos deny
He created human aetatis clay figulus clay
Ac created jinns ex blazing fire
(O humans jinns) de tuus Dominus marvels vos deny
Dominus de 2 easts 2 wests
Quae de tuus Dominus marvels vos deny
He separates 2 seas ubi they meet
barrier locus them prevent them ex transgressing
Quae de tuus Dominus marvels vos deny
Out de ambo them vos get pearls ac coral
Quae de tuus Dominus marvels vos deny
He dedit vos ships ut roam sea like flags
Quae de tuus Dominus marvels vos deny
